Text: I think people are searching by title and dont realize these are already up here in one torrent, oh well. I've always bulk downloaded and just deleted the titles i dont follow

But I think we're talking about two different things. Im lazy so instead of downloading 15 separate torrents, I download the DC week torrent and then remove the ones i do not want.

Holy crap, I had no idea about the bulk downloads.  Thanks for the heads up!  I don't mind snagging individual torrents, but sometimes I can't find all the titles... very much appreciated!
